page.title: 13Haverfordwest Aerodrome
page.content: Haverfordwest Aerodrome facilities include:- there are two{tankers,}one {land_rover,}a{fire_engine,}a{tractor and two{petrol pumps}kept there permanently; about fifty to sixty planes use the{air-strips}on a regular basis, although six thousand fly in and out in an average year! most of the planes cruise at about 100 m.p.h. and can carry thirty gallons of fuel, using eight gallons an hour; every six months a helicopter owned by{PINE WOOD STUDIOS}flies over Haverfordwest taking photographs of suitable areas for filming.They{house their{helicopter}at the Haverfordwest Aerodrome at Withybush.
